description:
Designed for maximum comfort, these jogging pants feature an elastic waistband with inside drawcords, allowing you to adjust the fit to your preference. They have convenient waist and back pockets, providing ample storage space for your essentials, whether you're lounging around after a big day outside or on the move.

To ensure a perfect fit and additional comfort, they are completed with elastic hem cuffs. You can relax and indulge in activities without restrictions, making them an ideal choice for camping trips or cozy evenings around a campfire.
name: Hooke Chalet Sweatpants - Mens

specs.value: Made of 50% cotton and 50% polyester, 340 g
